verses.verse: The whole earth <S%H776><s%> was of one <S%H259><s%> language <S%H8193><s%> and of one <S%H259><s%> speech. <S%H1697><s%>

It happened, <S%H5265><s%> as they traveled east, <S%H6924><s%> that they found <S%H4672><s%> a plain <S%H1237><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Shinar, <S%H8152><s%> and they lived there. <S%H3427><s%>

They said <S%H559><s%> one <S%H376><s%> to <S%H3051><s%> another, <S%H7453><s%> "Come, <S%H3051><s%> let <S%H3835><s%>'s make bricks, <S%H3843><s%> and burn <S%H8313><s%> them thoroughly. <S%H8316><s%>" They had brick <S%H3843><s%> for stone, <S%H68><s%> and they used tar <S%H2564><s%> for mortar. <S%H2563><s%>

They said, <S%H559><s%> "Come, <S%H3051><s%> let <S%H1129><s%>'s build ourselves a city, <S%H5892><s%> and a tower <S%H4026><s%> whose top <S%H7218><s%> reaches to the sky, <S%H8064><s%> and let <S%H6213><s%>'s make ourselves a name, <S%H8034><s%> lest we be scattered abroad <S%H6327><s%> on the surface <S%H6440><s%> of the whole earth. <S%H776><s%>"
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> came down <S%H3381><s%> to see <S%H7200><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> and the tower, <S%H4026><s%> which the children <S%H1121><s%> of men <S%H120><s%> built. <S%H1129><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Behold, <S%H259><s%> they are one people, <S%H5971><s%> and they have all one <S%H259><s%> language, <S%H8193><s%> and this is what they begin <S%H2490><s%> to do. <S%H6213><s%> Now nothing <S%H3808><s%> will be withheld <S%H1219><s%> from them, <S%H2161><s%> which they intend to do. <S%H6213><s%>

Come, <S%H3051><s%> let <S%H3381><s%>'s go down, and there confuse <S%H1101><s%> their language, <S%H8193><s%> that <S%H834><s%> they may not understand <S%H8085><s%> one <S%H376><s%> another <S%H7453><s%>'s speech. <S%H8193><s%>"

So Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> scattered them abroad <S%H6327><s%> from there <S%H8033><s%> on the surface <S%H6440><s%> of all the earth. <S%H776><s%> They stopped <S%H2308><s%> building <S%H1129><s%> the city. <S%H5892><s%>

Therefore its <S%H8034><s%> name was called <S%H7121><s%> Babel, <S%H894><s%> because there Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> confused <S%H1101><s%> the language <S%H8193><s%> of all the earth. <S%H776><s%> From there, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh scattered <S%H6327><s%> them abroad <S%H6327><s%> on the surface <S%H6440><s%> of all the earth. <S%H776><s%>

This is the history of the generations <S%H8435><s%> of Shem. <S%H8035><s%> Shem <S%H8035><s%> was one hundred <S%H3967><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Arpachshad <S%H775><s%> two years <S%H8141><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the flood. <S%H3999><s%>

Shem <S%H8035><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> after <S%H310><s%> he became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Arpachshad, <S%H775><s%> and became the father <S%H3205><s%> of sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters. <S%H1323><s%>
Arpachshad <S%H775><s%> lived <S%H2425><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%>- five <S%H2568><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> and became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Shelah. <S%H7974><s%>

Arpachshad <S%H775><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> after <S%H310><s%> he became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Shelah, <S%H7974><s%> and became the father <S%H3205><s%> of sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters. <S%H1323><s%>
Shelah <S%H7974><s%> lived <S%H2425><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Eber: <S%H5677><s%>

and Shelah <S%H7974><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> after <S%H310><s%> he became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Eber, <S%H5677><s%> and became the father <S%H3205><s%> of sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters. <S%H1323><s%>
Eber <S%H5677><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%>- four <S%H702><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Peleg. <S%H6389><s%>

Eber <S%H5677><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> after <S%H310><s%> he became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Peleg, <S%H6389><s%> and became the father <S%H3205><s%> of sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters. <S%H1323><s%>
Peleg <S%H6389><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Reu. <S%H7466><s%>

Peleg <S%H6389><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> two hundred <S%H3967><s%> nine <S%H8672><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> after <S%H310><s%> he became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Reu, <S%H7466><s%> and became the father <S%H3205><s%> of sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters. <S%H1323><s%>
Reu <S%H7466><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%>- two <S%H8147><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Serug. <S%H8286><s%>

Reu <S%H7466><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> two hundred <S%H3967><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> after <S%H310><s%> he became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Serug, <S%H8286><s%> and became the father <S%H3205><s%> of sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters. <S%H1323><s%>
Serug <S%H8286><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Nahor. <S%H5152><s%>

Serug <S%H8286><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> two hundred <S%H3967><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> after <S%H310><s%> he became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Nahor, <S%H5152><s%> and became the father <S%H3205><s%> of sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters. <S%H1323><s%>
Nahor <S%H5152><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%>- nine <S%H8672><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Terah. <S%H8646><s%>

Nahor <S%H5152><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> one hundred <S%H3967><s%> nineteen <S%H6240><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> after <S%H310><s%> he became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Terah, <S%H8646><s%> and became the father <S%H3205><s%> of sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters. <S%H1323><s%>
Terah <S%H8646><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> seventy <S%H7657><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Abram, <S%H87><s%> Nahor, <S%H5152><s%> and Haran. <S%H2039><s%>

Now this is the history of the generations <S%H8435><s%> of Terah. <S%H8646><s%> Terah <S%H8646><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Abram, <S%H87><s%> Nahor, <S%H5152><s%> and Haran. <S%H2039><s%> Haran <S%H2039><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Lot. <S%H3876><s%>

Haran <S%H2039><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> his father <S%H1><s%> Terah <S%H8646><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of his birth, <S%H4138><s%> in Ur <S%H218><s%> of the Chaldees. <S%H3778><s%>

Abram <S%H87><s%> and Nahor <S%H5152><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> wives. <S%H802><s%> The name <S%H8034><s%> of Abram <S%H87><s%>'s wife <S%H802><s%> was Sarai, <S%H8297><s%> and the name <S%H8034><s%> of Nahor <S%H5152><s%>'s wife, <S%H802><s%> Milcah, <S%H4435><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Haran <S%H2039><s%> who was also the father <S%H1><s%> of Iscah. <S%H3252><s%>
Sarai <S%H8297><s%> was barren. <S%H6135><s%> She had no child. <S%H2056><s%>

Terah <S%H8646><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> Abram <S%H87><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Lot <S%H3876><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Haran, <S%H2039><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>'s son, <S%H1121><s%> and Sarai <S%H8297><s%> his daughter-in <S%H3618><s%>-law, his son <S%H1121><s%> Abram <S%H87><s%>'s wife. <S%H802><s%> They went <S%H3318><s%> from Ur <S%H218><s%> of the Chaldees, <S%H3778><s%> to go <S%H3212><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan. <S%H3667><s%> They came <S%H935><s%> to Haran <S%H2771><s%> and lived there. <S%H3427><s%>
The days <S%H3117><s%> of Terah <S%H8646><s%> were two hundred <S%H3967><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%> Terah <S%H8646><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> in Haran. <S%H2771><s%>
